acquisition_date.Description: Date of acquistion at Singapore Bioimaging Consortium

breathing_rate.Description: Breathing rate in breath per minutes (bpm), recorded with a breathing pillow

condition.Description: Animals underwent one of the following condition

Levels.awake: Awake sate. Animals underwent incremental aclimatisation training over 10 days, 2 x 2 min, 2 x 5 min, 2 x 10 min, 2 x 30 min, 2 x 60 min, animal body was wrapped in padded fabric to restrain movement
Levels.mediso: Medetomidine 0.05mg/kg bolus / 0.1 mg/kg/h infusion (i.v.) + Isoflurane 0.5% in air/O2 1

gender.Description: Female c57bl/6 obtained from InVivos, Singapore, between 10 and 15 weeks
